Name: Ragnar Blackmane
Text: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet with an enemy warlord, deal 2 damage to a target enemy unit at that planet.

Name: Blackmane Sentinel
Text: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet, move this unit to that planet.

Name: Frostfang
Text: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a Space Wolves unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +2 HP while it it is at a planet with an enemy warlord.

Name: Ragnar's Warcamp
Text: Each Space Wolves unit you control at a planet with your warlord deals double damage while attacking an enemy warlord.

Name: Blackmane's Hunt
Text: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet, commit your warlord to an adjacent planet.

Name: Interrogator Acolyte
Text: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, draw 2 cards.

Name: Muster the Guard
Text: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to reduce the cost of each [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit you deploy this phase by 1.

Name: Noble Deed
Text: Action: Sacrifice an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit to deal damage equal to its printed ATK value to a target enemy army unit at the same planet.

Name: Deathskull Lootas
Text: Reaction: After this unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, destroy a target enemy support card.

Name: Smash 'n Bash
Text: Combat Action: Deal 1 damage to each unit you control at a target planet without an enemy warlord to ready up to 3 units you control at that planet.

Name: Heretek Inventor
Text: Forced Reaction: After this unit enters play, your opponent may move it to a planet of his choice.

Name: Uber Grotesque
Text: Reaction: After you play a Torture event card, this unit gets +3 ATK until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

Name: Visions of Agony
Text: Action: Look at your opponent's hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

Name: Archon's Palace
Text: Interrupt: When your opponent wins a command struggle, exhaust this support to cancel either the card bonus or the resource bonus of that planet this phase.

Name: Vaulting Harlequin
Text: Combat Action: Exhaust this unit to have it gain Flying until the end of the phase.

Name: Empower
Text: Play only during a battle. Combat Action: Each [ELDAR] unit you control at a target planet gets +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the battle.

Name: Starcannon
Text: Attach to an [ELDAR] Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gains Armorbane.

Name: Piranha Hunter
Text: Reaction: After this unit moves from one planet to another, draw 1 card.

Name: Aun'ui Prelate
Text: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, each other [TAU] unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase. Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

Name: Homing Beacon
Text: Reaction: After a unit you control moves to your HQ, exhaust this support to gain 1 [RESOURCE] or draw 1 card.

Name: Calamity
Text: Headquarters Action: Return each army unit with printed cost 2 or lower to its owner's hand.

Name: Ku'gath Plaguefather
Text: Reaction: After this warlord is declared as an attacker, move 1 damage from this warlord to another unit at this planet.

Name: Ku'gath's Nurglings
Text: Forced Reaction: After a unit moves to this planet, deal it 1 damage.

Name: Vile Laboratory
Text: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to have your opponent choose and move a non-Vehicle unit he controls from a target planet to an adjacent planet of his choice.

Name: The Plaguefather's Banner
Text: Attach to a Nurgle unit. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Reaction: After attached unit is declared as an attacker, move 1 damage from attached unit to another unit at this planet.

Name: Fetid Haze
Text: Combat Action: Remove all damage from a target Nurgle unit you control. Then, have your opponent deal an amount of indirect damage equal to the damage removed among army units he controls at the same planet.

Name: Morkai Rune Priest
Text: Forced Interrupt: When a non-Space Wolves unit retreats from this planet, deal 1 damage to that unit.

Name: Fenrisian Wolf
Text: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After a battle at this planet begins, exhaust attached unit to deal damage equal to its ATK value to a target army unit at the same planet.

Name: Dozer Blade
Text: Attach to a Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gets +2 HP.

Name: Inquisitorial Fortress
Text: Action: Exhaust and sacrifice this support to rout a target army unit.

Name: Dakka Dakka Dakka!
Text: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to deal 1 damage to each unit.

Name: Kustom Field Generator
Text: Reaction: After an [ORK] unit you control is assigned damage by an attack, exhaust this support to prevent all of that damage. Then, deal an amount of indirect damage equal to the damage prevented among [ORK] units you control at the same planet as the defender.

Name: Klaivex Warleader
Text: Reaction: After you deploy this unit during the combat phase, destroy a target damaged army unit at this planet.

Name: Bladed Lotus Rifle
Text: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK. If attached unit is a Kabalite, it gains Ranged.

Name: Soul Seizure
Text: Action: Put a target army unit with printed cost X or lower from your opponent's discard pile into play under your control at a planet. X is the number of Torture cards in your discard pile.

Name: Death from Above
Text: Deploy Action: Put a non-Elite Mobile unit into play from your hand at the last planet.

Name: Dome of Crystal Seers
Text: Interrupt: When you search your deck, search an additional 3 cards.

Name: Bork'an Recruits
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

Name: Kauyon Strike
Text: Combat Action: Move 1 or more Ethereal units you control to a target planet.

Name: Blacksun Filter
Text: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After an enemy warlord commits to the same planet as attached unit, gain 1[RESOURCE].

Name: Aun'shi
Text: Each [Tau] unit you control at this planet gains Armorbane. Forced Reaction: After this warlord resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

Name: Ethereal Envoy
Text: Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

Name: Aun'shi's Sanctum
Text: Action: Exhaust this support to ready a target unit at a planet with 1 or more Ethereal units you control.

Name: Honor Blade
Text: Attach to an Ethereal unit. Attached unit gains: 'Each other [Tau] unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK.'

Name: Ethereal Wisdom
Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, a target [Tau] unit gets +1 ATK and gains the Ethereal trait.

Name: White Scars Bikers
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

Name: Know No Fear
Text: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to move up to 3 [Space Marine] army units at your HQ, each to a different planet.

Name: Crushing Blow
Text: Reaction: After a [Space Marine] unit damages an enemy unit, deal 1 unpreventable damage to that enemy unit.

Name: Mystic Warden
Text: Forced Reaction: After a battle at this planet ends, sacrifice this unit.

Name: To Arms!
Text: Action: Ready a target support card.

Name: Honorifica Imperialis
Text: Attach to an army unit. While at a planet with an enemy warlord attached unit gains Armorbane and Ranged.

Name: Mekaniak Repair Krew
Text: Action: Exhaust this unit to ready a target [Ork] support card you control. Then, deal 1 damage to this unit.

Name: Goff Big Choppa
Text: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and gains Armorbane.

Name: Ammo Depot
Text: Action: Exhaust this support to draw 1 card if you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand.

Name: Rotten Plaguebearers
Text: Action: Exhaust this unit to deal 1 damage to a target unit at this planet.

Name: Nurgling Bomb
Text: Combat Action: Target a planet. For each non-Nurgle unit at that planet, its controller must choose to either deal 1 damage to it or rout it.

Name: Throne of Vainglory
Text: Action: Exhaust this support to discard the top card of your deck. If the printed cost of the discarded card is 3 or higher, put 2 Cultist tokens into play at your HQ.

Name: Sslyth Mercenary
Text: Action: Pay 2[Resource] to take control of this unit if it is at a planet. Any player may use this ability.

Name: Despise
Text: Combat Action: Each player must sacrifice an Ally unit he controls, if able.

Name: Warlock Destructor
Text: Forced Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, pay 1[Resource] or discard this unit.

Name: Eldritch Corsair
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

Name: Foretell
Text: Interrupt: When a Battle ability triggers, exhaust your warlord to cancel its effects. Then, draw 1 card.

Alt.Name: Old Zogwort
Alt.Text: Forced Reaction: After the combat phase ends, destroy each Snotlings token in play.

Name: Old Zogwort
Text: Reaction: After this warlord commits to a planet or is declared as an attacker, put a Snotlings token into play at this planet. Forced Reaction: After the combat phase ends, destroy each Snotlings token in play.

Name: Zogwort's Runtherders
Text: Interrupt: When this unit takes damage, put a Snotlings token into play at this planet.

Name: Zogwort's Hovel
Text: Reaction: After your warlord is declared as a defender, put a Snotlings token into play at the same planet as your warlord.

Name: Wyrdboy Stikk
Text: Attach to an Oddboy unit. Reaction: After a Snotlings token is destroyed, exhaust this attachment to put a Snotlings token into play at a planet.

Name: Launch Da Snots
Text: Reaction: After an [Ork] unit you control is declared as an attacker, it gets +X ATK for that attack. X is the number of Snotlings tokens at the same planet as the attacking unit.

Name: Blood Claw Pack
Text: Reaction: After an enemy warlord commits to this planet, exhaust this unit to put a Space Wolves unit into play from your hand at this planet.

Name: Rally the Charge
Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, a target [Space Marine] unit you control at a planet with your warlord gets +2 ATK for each command icon it has.

Name: Secluded Apothecarion
Text: Reaction: After a [Space Marine] unit you control is destroyed, exhaust this support to gain 1[Resource].

Name: Steel Legion Chimera
Text: Reaction: After a non-Vehicle unit you control at this planet is assigned damage by an attack, prevent 1 of that damage.

Name: Tallarn Raiders
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

Name: Staging Ground
Text: Action: Exhaust this support to deploy a unit with cost 2 or lower at a planet.

Name: Gleeful Plague Beast
Text: Forced Reaction: After the combat phase begins, deal 1 damage to each unit at this planet.

Name: Doombolt
Text: Deploy Action: Deal X damage to a target enemy army unit. X is the amount of damage on that unit.

Name: Blight Grenades
Text: Attach to a Nurgle army unit. Combat Action: Sacrifice this attachment to give attached unit Area Effect (2) until the end of the combat round.

Name: Bloodied Reavers
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord

Name: Crucible of Malediction
Text: Reaction: After you play a Torture event card, exhaust this support to look at the top 3 cards of a deck. Discard 1 of those cards, and place the remaining cards on top of that deck in any order.

Name: Searing Brand
Text: Combat Action: Deal 3 unpreventable damage to a target non-warlord unit at a planet with your warlord. Your opponent may discard 2 cards to cancel this effect.

Name: Vectored Vyper Squad
Text: This unit gains Mobile while it is undamaged.

Name: Guardian Mesh Armor
Text: Attach to an [Eldar] army unit. Interrupt: When you use a shield card to prevent damage to attached unit, exhaust this attachment to double the number of shields on that card.

Name: Sa'cea XV88 Broadside
Text: This unit gains Area Effect (2) while it has 1 or more attachments.

Name: Tense Negotiations
Text: Action: Exhaust your warlord to trigger the Battle ability at the same planet as your warlord.

Name: Heavy Marker Drone
Text: Attach to an enemy army unit. Double damage dealt to attached unit.

Name: Torquemada Coteaz
Text: Combat Action: Sacrifice a unit at this planet to give this warlord +3 ATK for its next attack this phase. (Limit once per attack.)

Name: Coteaz's Henchmen
Text: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, ready your warlord.

Name: Formosan Black Ship
Text: Interrupt: When you sacrifice a non-token unit, exhaust this support to put 2 Guardsman tokens into play at the same planet as the sacrificed unit.

Name: The Glovodan Eagle
Text: Attach to your warlord. Attached warlord gets +1 ATK. Combat Action: Detach this card to have it become an army unit with 1 ATK and 1 HP and the text: 'Action: Return this unit to your hand.'

Name: The Emperor Protects
Text: Interrupt: When a unit you control leaves play from a planet with your warlord, return that unit to your hand instead.

Name: Firedrake Terminators
Text: Reaction: After this unit is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacker.

Name: Imperial Fists Siege Force
Text: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, rout 1 or more target Ally units at this planet.

Name: Nocturne-Ultima Storm Bolter
Text: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After attached unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, deal damage equal to attached unit's ATK value to another target unit at the same planet.

Name: Snakebite Thug
Text: Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, deal 1 damage to it.

Name: Evil Sunz Warbiker
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

Name: Mork's Great Heap
Text: Each non-token F unit you control gets +1 HP.

Name: Noise Marine Zealots
Text: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

Name: Turbulent Rift
Text: Reaction: After you deploy an Elite unit, deal 1 damage to that unit to deal 1 damage to each enemy unit at that planet.

Name: Cacophonic Choir
Text: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to have your opponent deal X indirect damage among units he controls. X is the number of units your opponent controls.

Name: Kabalite Halfborn
Text: Interrupt: When this unit leavec play, draw 1 card.

Name: Slake the Thirst
Text: Action: Exhaust your warlord to discard up to 3 cards at random from a target player's hand. Then, that player draws cards equal to the number of cards discarded.

Name: Shadow Field
Text: Attach to a L army unit. Attached unit cannot be dealt damage by an army unit with printed cost 2 or lower.

Name: Mighty Wraithknight
Text: Reaction: After this unit enters play, exhaust each non-Spirit unit at this planet.

Name: Seer's Exodus
Text: Action: Move 1 or more units you control at a planet with your warlord to your HQ.

Name: Slumbering Gardens
Text: Interrupt: When an effect would move a unit you control from a planet, exhaust this support to cancel that effect.

Name: Fire Warrior Grenadiers
Text: For each Ethereal unit you control at this planet, this unit gets +2 ATK and gains 1 command icon.

Name: Ksi'M'Yen Orbital City
Text: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to move an Ethereal unit from your HQ to a target planet. Then, ready that unit.

Name: Baharroth's Hawks
Text: This unit gets +3 ATK while it is at a planet with your warlord.

Name: Banner of the Ashen Sky
Text: Reaction: After a unit moves from one planet to another, exhaust this support to give that unit +2 ATK for its next attack this phase.

Name: The Shining Blade
Text: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a Mobile unit. Interrupt: When attached unit declares an attack, declare that attack against an enemy unit at an adjacent planet instead.

Name: Cry of the Wind
Text: Reaction: After a unit moves from one planet to another, move that unit to an adjacent planet.

Name: Urien Rakarth
Text: The cost for you to play each Torture event is reduced by 1. The cost for you to play each non-Torture event is increased by 1.

Name: Twisted Wracks
Text: Action: Discard a Torture card from your hand to ready this unit.

Name: Rakarth's Experimentations
Text: Action: Name a card type (unit, support, attachment, event). Your opponent must either discard 1 card of that type from his hand or deal 1 damage to his warlord.

Name: Ichor Gauntlet
Text: Attach to your warlord. Reaction: After you play a Torture event card, exhaust attached warlord to copy its effects. You may choose new targets.

Name: Urien's Oubliette
Text: Your opponent plays with the top card of his deck revealed. Action: Exhaust this support to discard the top card of each player's deck or have each player draw 1 card.

Name: Space Wolves Predator
Text: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, your opponent cannot commit his warlord to this planet this round unless it is the only planet in play.

Name: Primal Howl
Text: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet with an enemy warlord, draw 3 cards. Max 1 per turn.

Name: Hallow Librarium
Text: Action: Exhaust this support to have a target unit at a planet without an enemy warlord get -2 ATK until the end of the phase.

Name: Big Shoota Battlewagon
Text: Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, put 4 Snotlings tokens into play at this planet.

Name: Made Ta Fight
Text: Interrupt: When an army unit you control leaves play from a planet with your warlord, deal damage equal to that army unit's printed ATK value to a target non-warlord unit at the same planet.

Name: Squiggify
Text: Combat Action: Target a non-Vehicle army unit. Until the end of the phase, set that unit's ATK value to 1, its printed text box is treated as blank (except for Traits), and it gains the Squig trait.

Name: Ancient Keeper Of Secrets
Text: Action: Sacrifice a Cultist unit to ready this unit.

Name: Slaanesh's Temptation
Text: Attach to a planet. Increase the cost of each enemy unit being deployed at another planet by 1. Forced Reaction: After a battle at attached planet ends, sacrifice this attachment.

Name: Doom Siren
Text: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After attached unit uses its Area Effect ability, deal damage equal to its Area Effect value to each enemy unit at each adjacent planet. Then, sacrifice the attached unit.

Name: Shrieking Basilisk
Text: Reaction: After this unit damages an enemy unit, exhaust a target support card.

Name: The Emperor's Warrant
Text: Combat Action: Exhaust a target enemy unit at a planet without an enemy warlord. Then, deal damage equal to that unit's ATK value to another target unit at that planet.

Name: Vior'la Warrior Cadre
Text: This unit gains Ranged while you control an Ethereal unit at this planet.

Name: For the Tau'va
Text: Action: Exhaust your warlord to ready each unit you control with 1 or more attachments.

Name: Inquisitor Caius Wroth
Text: Reaction: After this unit enters play, each player must choose and discard down to 4 cards in his hand, if able.
